attributes.additional_details: We call on the UK government to look  into incorporating Direct democracy  into the UK voting system. This could be done by allowing the house of lords  to put  legislation up for referendum that it is against but believe the public should have a  say on . It would also make the house of lords more democratic  and stop the  house of commons pushing through laws and disregarding the second house. The lords could get a maximum referral each parliament and any referendum would be held at the same time as the next general election.
